textBeforeTable: Schedule of Games Live video will be made available for free for non-LSU games, but will not have an accompanying audio broadcast. These will include only natural sound and the public address announcer. Note: Live Video and audio streams for games involving LSU will be available to members of the Geaux Zone on LSUsports.net (Join now to get a free Trent Johnson autographed mini-basketball).
